headline: $118.14 Bn Fire Protection System Market - Global Forecast to 2030 with Johnson Controls, Honeywell International, Siemens, Robert Bosch, and Eaton Leading
summary: The global fire protection system market is set to expand from USD 85.06 billion in 2025 to USD 118.14 billion by 2030, growing at a 6.8% CAGR. This growth is fueled by rapid industrialization, urban infrastructure expansion, and stringent global fire safety regulations. Key advancements in IoT-enabled fire monitoring, AI-assisted analysis, and predictive maintenance are enhancing safety measures. The industrial sector leads the market, relying heavily on advanced systems to safeguard against fi
